page.title: 02A CHILD'S DAY AT HOME
page.content: My name is Gaynor. I am a girl aged 11. At 7.30 am I get up, dress, have a wash and clean my teeth. Then I go downstairs and put my dog outside and feed her. At 7.45 I get my baby sister Isobel up and give her something to eat. At 8.00 I check that Gabrielle, my other sister is awake. At 8.35 Gabrielle and I set off for school. It is a 15 minute walk. We return from school at 4.00 pm and for 30 minutes we have to tidy our bedrooms. Then we have to help mum for another 30 minutes. After that we can play. When our mum is at work in the evening we have to go to stay with our grandma. Dad collects us from there at 7.15 pm. When we arrive home I put the baby to bed. Mum gets home about an hour later. Then we have a drink and Gabrielle goes to bed. I go to bed at about 10.00pm.That is 30 minutes later
